body_html:
In term of actual value, this should be consistent with timeline.Timeline(run_metadata.step_stats)? (since they all parse the same information from run_metadata?)
But then someone says it's only the approximated memory usage by simulation, no the actual footprint, is it still the case?
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36123740/is-there-a-way-of-determining-how-much-gpu-memory-is-in-use-by-tensorflow

body:
In term of actual value, this should be consistent with timeline.Timeline(run_metadata.step_stats)? (since they all parse the same information from run_metadata?)
But then someone says it's only the approximated memory usage by simulation, no the actual footprint, is it still the case?
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36123740/is-there-a-way-of-determining-how-much-gpu-memory-is-in-use-by-tensorflow
